content:
Understood, here are three new creature races that can complement the existing snatchers, munchies, and shapeshifters:

1. Collectors: These creatures have a passive ability that allows them to pick up extra fruit cards when they collect fruit. They also have an active ability that lets them trade fruit cards with other players.
2. Protectors: These creatures have a passive ability that adds an extra layer of protection to their fruit cards. They also have an active ability to move a fruit card from one slot to another, effectively protecting their fruits from other players.
3. Conjurers: These creatures have the ability to manipulate the game by using magic. They have a passive ability that lets them swap fruit cards from their hand with other players without their knowledge. They also have an active ability to create a duplicate of any fruit card in play.

These new creature races bring new strategies and play styles to the game, and add more depth and excitement to the gameplay.
